Did you know that `?` also works with datasets in packages in R to get further information. For example you can use `?palmerpenguins::penguins` to get more info about the palmerpenguins penguins dataset. Below is a composite screenshot showing example syntax and the results in your help pane.

![](images/question.png)

Happy coding!
